      Activity createActivity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String venue)
      Creates new Activity object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - no other activity exists with the same name
      boolean deleteActivity(Activity activity)
      Deletes a specific activity along with all its individual sessions Prerequisites: - No users must be signed up for this activity (its Membership objects list must be empty)
      boolean deleteActivitySessions(Activity activity)
      Deletes all sessions of a specific activity Prerequisites: - No registers must exist for any of the sessions

    • Method Detail

      • createActivity

        public Activity createActivity(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String venue)
        Creates new Activity object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - no other activity exists with the same name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this activity
        description - a short description of the activity
        venue - the venue where the activity sessions take place
        Returns:
        Activity|null The created Activity object or null

      • updateActivity

        public boolean updateActivity(Activity activity)
        Updates activity
        Parameters:
        activity -
        Returns:
        true if update successful, false otherwise

      • deleteActivity

        public boolean deleteActivity(Activity activity)
        Deletes a specific activity along with all its individual sessions Prerequisites: - No users must be signed up for this activity (its Membership objects list must be empty)
        Parameters:
        activity -
        Returns:
        true if deletion successful, false otherwise

      • deleteActivitySessions

        public boolean deleteActivitySessions(Activity activity)
        Deletes all sessions of a specific activity Prerequisites: - No registers must exist for any of the sessions
        Parameters:
        activity -
        Returns:
        true if deletion successful, false otherwise
